divs: Sighting DetailsME AND MY FRIEND WHER OUTSIDE THE PORCH OF HOUSE DRINKING COFFEE WHEN OUT OF NOWHERE A TRIANGULAR SHAPE OBJECT WAS HOVERING OVER US AT ABOUT 35- 50' IN THE SKY, IT WAS AVERY CLEAR SKY AND FULL MOON SO I GOT TO SEE THE DEATAILS OF THE OBJECT. IT WAS TRAVELING AT ABOUT 20-TO 35 MPH. THE THREE LIGHTS WHER VERY DIM BUT I GOT TO SEE MORE DETAILS ON THE OBJECT. IT WAS NOT SCARY AT ALL I WAS JUST IN A BIG WOW . I ASK MY FRIEND GEORGE (did you see that ?) he answerd ,( i told you they wher real.)the encounter it lasted about 15 seaconds and thats when it past the top of the house. after that incident i have had the chance to see another object cilyder typ in the month of june 2009, traveling at super speed .now that was a little scary. fitchburg mass. is avery hot spot for these objects all you have to do is look up on a clear night and you will have a big chance to see one some day. good hunting!
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Leominster
There were no other sightings in Leominster on or around February 28th 2005
